alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal to 8 miles northeast of Fortymile Bend. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County
